sql.query: select top 16 indate, isnull(id,'') as id, isnull(policy,'') as policy, (CASE code WHEN '1' THEN '보험료 납부증명서' WHEN '2' THEN '보험 가입증명서' WHEN '3' THEN '보험 증권재발행' WHEN '4' THEN '대출 잔액증명서' END) as code, (CASE subcode WHEN '1' THEN '전년말' WHEN '2' THEN '당년말' WHEN '3' THEN '현재시점' WHEN 'O' THEN '직장' WHEN 'H' THEN '자택' END) as subcode, (CASE method WHEN '1' THEN '우편' WHEN '2' THEN 'eMail' WHEN '3' THEN '팩스' WHEN '4' THEN '우편+eMail' WHEN '5' THEN '우편+팩스' WHEN '6' THEN 'eMail+팩스' WHEN '7' THEN '우편+eMail+팩스' WHEN '8' THEN '화면출력' END) as method, isnull(name,'') as name, isnull(post,'') as post, isnull(addr1,'') as addr1,isnull(addr2,'') as addr2, isnull(addr3,'') as addr3, isnull(addr4,'') as addr4, isnull(fax,'') as fax, isnull(phone,'') as phone, isnull(email,'') as email, isnull(intime,'') as intime, isnull(prdate,'') as prdate, isnull(prtime,'') as prtime, isnull(prname,'') as prname, (CASE rtn WHEN '0' THEN '접수' WHEN '1' THEN '처리' WHEN '2' THEN '발송' WHEN '3' THEN '반송' END) rtn, label_yn, (select count(*) from CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_wb_letter where indate+policy is not null $where ) as tot_cnt, (select count(*) from CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_wb_letter where indate+policy is not null and rtn='0' $where ) as rtn0, (select count(*) from CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_wb_letter where indate+policy is not null and rtn='1' $where ) as rtn1 from CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_wb_letter where indate+policy is not null $where and indate+policy not in ( select top $page indate+policy from CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_wb_letter where indate is not null $subwhere order by indate desc, intime desc ) order by indate desc, intime desc
